reviews.text: A nice tasting african beer which carries a lot of Tananian pride. Better than Kilimanjaro, Ndovu and Tusker. Not better than Castle
A hopps beer that will get you trashed nicely of seven or eight with a percentage of 8. A strong beer.
Color reminds me of a serengit lager, which looks like piss, dont judge a book by it's cover. Much better in taste, but nothing to scream about.
